title: Soups
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Discover the pleasure of home-made soups with Chef Ian Algeroen. Nutritious, satisfying and easy to make in advance, soups are infinitely versatile - ranging from delicate first courses to hearty main-dish chowders. Start with creamy, aromatic Four Onion Soup. Then try contemporary Grilled Corn Chowder and refreshing Grilled Vegetable Gazpacho, the chilled "garden soup" of Spain. Each is a lesson in combining techniques and ingredients to produce rich flavours, pleasing textures and tempting presentations.
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
